error.message: Call to deprecated function node_load(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\node\Entity\Node::load().
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Call to deprecated function entity_create(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use The method overriding Entity::create() for the entity type, e.g. \Drupal\node\Entity\Node::create() if the entity type is known. If the entity type is variable, use the entity storage's create() method to construct a new entity:
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Call to deprecated method link() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\EntityInterface::toLink()->toString() instead.

Parameter $alias_manager of method Drupal\linkback\LinkbackService::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Path\AliasManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\path_alias\AliasManagerInterface.

Parameter $entityQuery of method Drupal\linkback\Plugin\QueueWorker\LinkbackReceiver::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\simpletest\ContentTypeCreationTrait in class Drupal\Tests\linkback\Kernel\LinkbackKernelTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\node\Traits\ContentTypeCreationTrait instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\simpletest\NodeCreationTrait in class Drupal\Tests\linkback\Kernel\LinkbackServiceTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\node\Traits\NodeCreationTrait instead.

Instantiation of deprecated class Drupal\Core\Path\AliasStorage: \Drupal\Core\Path\AliasStorage is deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the "path_alias.repository" service instead, or the entity storage handler for the "path_alias" entity type for CRUD methods.

Call to deprecated method setExpectedException() of class Drupal\KernelTests\KernelTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Backward compatibility for PHPUnit 4 will no longer be supported.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to linkback.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
